title: Strengthening Programming Practical Competencies: Online Medical Experiential Learning Design in Blended Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental medical knowledge and experience in clinical support tasks
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can experientially explain the application process of three or more medical protocols using Virtual Patient Simulation (VPS)
Learners can collaboratively write one complex case analysis report with peers using online collaboration tools
Learners can demonstrate practical skills using real medical equipment at least twice in a blended environment
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
